subject: Economy
question_en: What is the current GDP of India in terms of 2019-2020?
question_hi: भारत के समाधानी 2019-2020 तक क्या ग्रुप D GDP है?
explanation_en: According to the National Accounts Statistics released by the Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation, the Gross Domestic Product (GDP) of India in terms of current prices for the financial year 2020-21 is Rs. 291,000 crore.
